Package jMidiSequencerBeta.view

Class AudioView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • jMidiSequencerBeta.view.AudioView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, ICompositionView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeView
    public class AudioView
extends java.util.Observable
implements ICompositionView
    The class implements a MIDI playback view of a composition.
